mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (member_id, member_password, member_email, member_phoneNum, member_birthday, member_name, member_nickName, member_comments) VALUES (#{member_id}, #{member_password}, #{member_email}, #{member_phoneNum}, #{member_birthday}, #{member_name}, #{member_nickName}, #{member_comments})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(member_id) FROM member WHERE member_id = #{ID}
select member_name from member where member_id = #{member_id} and member_password = #{member_password}
select member_id from member where member_name = #{name} and member_phoneNum = #{phone}
select member_id from member where member_id = #{id} and member_email = #{email}
mapper.update: update member set member_password = #{ranPassword} where member_id = #{id}
